name: Meta-Ph-List: Gamma X 2297
overview: Meta-Ph-List: Gamma X 2097 is a classic vertical shooter game in which the player takes the role of a pilot that got the mission of destroy an alien army that had taken over some planets in the year 2097. The gameplay is divided into different levels that takes place in different planets, but the game lacks of different graphics since in each level most of the time the graphics are the same, it seems like playing more a demo than a final game, and the game got an evil difficulty level that makes really hard to complete a single mission.
